page.title: 14ANDOVER DOWN FARM
page.content: The farm is run by Miss Brock single_handed.She does not keep cows for dairy she uses them for beef cattle.She has a hundred ewes and two rams.She used to keep chickens but she doesn't anymore.The lambs are used for their meat.The sheep are used for their wool.The cows are hereford cross breed heifers and there are seven.The sheep are dipped for one minute in a six foot dip to get rid of any infection,they are dipped twice a year.The sheep are sheared at the beginning of the year in the spring. The two rams are used for breeding purposes.Miss Brock started with two lambs in 1969 and one of them is still alive. The farm is owned by her parents but she manages it. The food store is 93 years old.
